video.title: Danger 5
video.synopsis: A trio of experienced spies joins forces with a pair of newbies to form the Danger 5, a squad tasked with the formidable task of offing Adolf Hitler.

episodes.synopsis: The Nazis steal the Eiffel Tower and set their sights on the Statue of Liberty. Meanwhile, Ilsa and Claire are captured and held in a dungeon.
episodes.title: I Danced for Hitler

episodes.synopsis: When Nazi dinosaurs attack Allied troops, Danger 5 travels to the South Pole to investigate their origins and encounters Nazi doctor Josef Mengele.
episodes.title: Lizard Soldiers of the Third Reich

episodes.synopsis: Hitler and Emperor Hirohito team up to create a squadron of Nazi Japanese robot super-soldiers, who shoot down the Danger Fighters.
episodes.title: Kill-Men of the Rising Sun

episodes.synopsis: In search of a missing agent, the team heads to a West African casino run by Hitler and Isla's ex-husband, Erwin Rommel.
episodes.title: Hitler's Golden Murder Palace

episodes.synopsis: Danger 5 has their hands full when Allied troops start to turn into sex-crazed Nazis, including Field Marshal Jenkins's entire platoon.
episodes.title: Fresh Meat for Hitler's Sex Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: The Allies are on the edge of defeat, but a bizarre telegram from the lost city of Atlantis could hold the key to defeating the giant Nazi monsters.
episodes.title: Final Victory

episodes.synopsis: After failing to assassinate Hitler and end World War II, Jackson, Pierre and Tucker get two new recruits to form Danger 5 and finish their mission.
episodes.title: Diamond Girls (Bonus - Series Prequel)

episodes.synopsis: When Colonel Chestbridge is brutally gunned down by a mall Santa, Danger 5 tracks the killer's helper to Buenos Aires, where they get a surprise.
episodes.title: Merry Christmas Colonel

episodes.synopsis: Hitler poses as a high school student, Johnny Hitler, the coolest kid on campus, and all he wants is a date with world domination.
episodes.title: Johnny Hitler

episodes.synopsis: As the Metro City police hunt down Danger 5, the team discovers a bigger problem: The rookie policemen are being transformed into lizardmen.
episodes.title: Revenge of the Lizardmen

episodes.synopsis: When Danger 5 discovers a plot to convert the Catholic Church to Nazism on Christmas Eve, they must act fast to save Christmas.
episodes.title: Un Sacco Di Natale

episodes.synopsis: Hitler returns from the dead as a zombie, bringing a horde of Nazi zombies with him, then invades the Soviet Union.
episodes.title: Super Dead

episodes.synopsis: Danger 5 travels 18 years back in time to stop Hitler from winning World War II, but when they encounter their past selves, the plan goes awry.
episodes.title: Back to the Führer

episodes.synopsis: In an alternate future, Hitler is the supreme ruler of the universe, which puts Danger 5 on a mission of cosmic proportions to save the free world.
episodes.title: Welcome To Hitlerland
